1.title: how does it start

11.content: it was a nice day in ponyville nothing bad happening and everything was peaceful but then a new pony walks into Ponyville and his name was Harley and he is an Alicorn. "this is a nice place" Said Harley but he falls over out of exaustion and who came to help him?
11.title: walks to ponyville

111.content: Harley awoke to a purple Alicorn with a pink strip in her mane. She said "Hi, I'm Twilight Sparkle. My friends call me Twilight. Who are you?" "I'm Harley." said Harley. What does Twilight do now?
111.title: Twilight Sparkle

1111.content: Twilight went to her friends. "Hi, you lot. This is Harley. Harley, these are my friends. The blue pegasus with the rainbow mane is Rainbow Dash, the pink pony who is bouncing around is Pinkie Pie, the yellow pegasus with the pink mane is Fluttershy, the orange pony with the yellow mane and the cowboy hat is Applejack, and the white unicorn with the purple mane is Rarity." "Pleased to meet you" they said. What do the main 6 ponies do now?
1111.title: Introduce Harley to her friends.

11111.content: Harley was shown the library. Does he find any books he enjoys?
11111.title: They show him the library.

111111.content: What book does Harley find?
111111.title: Yes.

1111111.content: Harley saw a book that looked very interesting. It was called The History of Equestria. He read a chapter on...
1111111.title: A history book.

11112.content: Rarity took Harley's measurements and sewed him a suit. Does Harley like the suit?
11112.title: Rarity sews Harley a suit.

11113.content: Which do they show first?
11113.title: They show him around.

111131.content: "This is my farm, Sweet Apple Acres. We have pigs, chickens, and we also grow a lot of apples here that we sell to the other citizens of Equestria. And this is my brother Big McIntosh, or Big Mac for short, and my sister Apple Bloom." What do they do now?
111131.title: The farm.

1111312.content: Where do they continue to?
1111312.title: Continue.

111132.content: "This is Sugar Cube Corner, where I live, and the family who work here are the cakes. Hi, Mr. Cake, this is Harley." said Pinkie Pie. "May I interest you in something?". Do the ponies order food?
111132.title: Sugarcube Corner.

1112.content: "Are you hungry?" said Twilight. IS Harley hungry?
1112.title: Offer Harley something to eat.

11121.content: "Actually, I could use a snack?" said Harley. What does Twilight offer Harley?
11121.title: Yes.

choices: Twilight and Spike think that seeing as Harley is an Alicorn, he must be royalty
111211.content: Twilight gave Harley some hay and he ate it up. Spike came up and said "Hi, who's your friend." "That's Harley." said Twilight. "This is my assistant Spike. And that owl over there is Owlowiscious." "Hoo." said Owlowiscious. "Owlowiscious." said Twilight. What happens now?
111211.title: Hay

choices: Takes Harley to the hospital. (best choice)
Takes him to see Twilight to see if she could heal his wing with magic
Takes him to Sweet apple acres and tries to treat it herself. (Bad choice.)
112.content: Harley was on the ground with a broken wing from when he flew most of the times in his travels and he busted his wing while flying once and Applejack comes and helps him up. "Howdy i'm Applejack." Said Applejack. "I'm Harley and OWW" Said Harley but he was in pain from his broken left wing what does Applejack do to help with his injured wing?
112.title: the farmpony helps the injured Alicorn.

1121.content: "Follow me to the hospital." said Twilight. At the hospital, what did the doctors do?
1121.title: Takes Harley to the hospital. (best choice)

11211.content: Does Harley like the medicine?
11211.title: Give him medicine.

112111.content: "Open wide and say aah" said Nurse Tenderheart. "Ahh" said Harley. Nurse Tenderheart took a bottle of pink liquid and poured it into a spoon. She then took it in her mouth and put it in Harley's mouth. It tasted like a cross between cough syrup and raspberry jam, quite enjoyable. How does the medicine work?
112111.title: Yes.

choices: Yes, but it has a side effect.
1122.content: "Follow me." said Applejack. "I have a friend who may be able to heal you." When they got to Twilight's library, she said "Applejack. This here's Harley. He's broken his wing. Can you heal him." Twilight read a book and then did a spell on Harley. Does the spell work?
1122.title: Takes him to see Twilight to see if she could h...

11221.content: Twilight flipped through a book and then there was a flash of light and Harley's wing was completely better. "How can I ever thank you?" he asked. What happens now?
11221.title: Yes.

11222.content: It didn't work. Now what?
11222.title: No.

112221.content: Applejack said "C'mon, Harley. Let's get ya to the hospital." Soon they arrived at the hospital. The doctor X-rayed Harley and found out the wing was...
112221.title: They take him to hospital.

11223.content: What is the side effect?
11223.title: Yes, but it has a side effect.

112231.content: The spell healed Harley but it shrunk him down to the size of a duckling. What do they do to help Harley?
112231.title: Shrinking.

choices: Fluttershy, Rarity, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie."
1122311.content: "Well, now he's all teeny-weeny, what should we do?" said Applejack. Twilight replied "Let's go ask....
1122311.title: Ask the others for advice.

1122312.content:
"Follow us, sugarcane." said Applejack, and they walked off, tiny Harley flying alongside. They went into the Everfree forest and came to Decor's hut. "Hello, you lot. What brings you here?" said Zecora. She then noticed Harley looked scared and added "Don't be frightened, there's nothing to fear." "Well, you see, I found this here individual with a hurt wing, so I took him to Twilight and she tried to heal him, and it worked but it doggone shrunk him. Can you make him regular size?" said Applejack.
Can Zecora bring Harley back to regular size?
1122312.title: Take him to Zecora.

choices: It turns him into a baby.

1122321.title: It turns him into a baby.

11412.title: Twilight Sparkle.

choices: Princess Celestia assigns them each a job.

What does EVERYONE do to help Harley?

"Gee, I hope he's OK." said Fluttershy. "He looks all droopy. We'd better get his spring back." said Pinkie Pie. "Do you have any ideas, Twilight?" said Rainbow Dash. "Well..." said Twilight. "We could...A
1153112.title: Her friends.

11532112.title: Go outside and look.

115331.content: So the Cutie Mark Crusaders were walking along trying to get their cutie marks, but then they saw an injured Alicorn. They couldn't agree what to do. Apple Bloom wanted to get help and Sweetie Belle wanted to earn a cutie mark by helping him herself. Scootaloo was on the fence. Whose idea do they act on?

115332211.content: She fed him some medicine and he came to. "Hi, I;m Harley." he said. "Who are you?" "I'm Granny Smith." said Granny Smith. "Hey, Granny, what's goin' on?" said Applejack coming in. "This is Harley, I was giving him medicine." said Granny Smith. Apple Bloom came in, asking for a snack, but then said "Who's this?" "That's Harley" said Granny Smith. Big Macintosh came over. "What's all this? Is that an Alicorn?" he said. "This is Harley." said Granny Smith. "And he's our guest." "Who are they?" said Granny Smith. "These are my granddaughters Applejack (she's the one with the hat) and Apple Bloom, and my grandson Big McIntosh. His friends call him Big Mac. And that's Winona. She's our dog. Welcome to Sweet Apple Acres." What does Harley do first?
115332211.title: Gave him some medicine.

115332221.content: Big Mac was bucking apples and then he saw an Alicorn stallion lying on the floor. He took hold of the Alicorn's hoof in his mouth and put him on his back, back to the farm. "Hey, guys!" he said. "I found somepony on the ground outside." There was talk of what to do. Apple Bloom wanted to take him to Zecora. Granny Smith wanted to feed him medicine and Applejack and Big Mac were on the fence. Whose idea do they end up following?
115332221.title: Eeyup.

1153322221.content: Zecora saw Harley lying on the ground and she went and got a Potion of Plentiful Stamina. She fed it to Harley, who instantly perked up. "Good afternoon and a how do you do, my name's Zecora. Who are you?" said Zecora. "I'm Harley." said Harley. What happens now?

115332222211121211221.content:
As Discord himself transformed Harley into a giant talking beaver as he disappeared in an instant, as Harley could only stand there and shrug his shoulders.

"Since Discord's transformed me into a giant talking beaver, what am I going to do now?" Harley asked himself.

Harley then thought of something he could do.

"Perhaps I should go find Discord and get him to change me back to normal, or I could go over to Ponyville and find someone who can help me." Harley said to himself.
115332222211121211221.title: Beaver

1153322222111212112211.content: Where does he look for Discord?
1153322222111212112211.title: Find Discord and get him to turn Harley back to...

He decided to go to Ponyville.
In Ponyville, he met...
1153322222111212112212.title: Go over to Ponyville and find someone who can h...

choices: Applejack soon returns with some reinforcements.
11533222221112121122121.content:
As Harley made his way into Ponyville, Applejack noticed a rather huge looking beaver coming her way as Applejack stood her ground.

"I take it that you are one of the mane six ponies." Harley said.

"I am and who are y'all anyway?" Applejack asked.

"My name's Harley and I'm looking for Discord since he transformed me into a giant talking beaver." Harley explained.

"Discord? He did this to you? Why that no good fiend, he should have known better than to do that." Applejack said.

"Now what are we going to do since Discord's responsible for this happening?" Harley asked.

"I'll get the others to help us out and whatnot if y'all know what I mean." Applejack answered.

Applejack then flew off to inform her friends of the situation at hand as Harley watched her fly off into the sky itself.
11533222221112121122121.title: Applejack.

11533222221112212.content: "Strange." said Twilight. "A tiny little Alicorn." "I got shrunk by Discord." said Harley. "Can you help me?" Twilight looked through her books. Does she find a way to get Harley back to normal size?
11533222221112212.title: Twilight Sparkle.

choices: Try to go back to regular size.
1153322222111222.content: Discord snapped his fingers and Harley grew bigger and bigger and bigger until he was fifty feet tall. When Harley woke up, what did he do?
1153322222111222.title: Make him bigger.

1153322222112.content: Discord stole Harley's cutie mark. What does Harley do?
1153322222112.title: Cutie Un-Mark him.

choices: Babysit Pound Cake and Pumpkin Cake.
Help the Cakes and Pinkie deliver baked goods.
115332222221.content: When Harley woke up, he was with the Cakes in Sugarcube Corner. A chubby blue Earth pony with a pink mane and tail walked up. "Hi, I am Cup Cake and this is my husband Carrot Cake. And this is our son Pound Cake and our daughter Pumpkin Cake." said the blue pony, pointing to a lanky orange Earth pony and two babies who both had yellow fur and one was a pegasus with a brown mane and tail and one was a unicorn with an orange mane and tail, who also had a bow in her hair. A pink Earth pony bounced up. "And this is our assistant Pinkie Pie." said Cup Cake. "I'm not meaning to be rude, but why are your children a pegasus and a unicorn despite you two being Earth ponies?" "That's not rude." said Cup Cake. "That's just a curious mind. Their great-great-great-great-great grandfather was a unicorn, and my great-aunt's second cousin twice removed was a pegasus." Harley then decided to help the Cakes and Pinkie to make up for them giving him a bed. What did he do for help?
115332222221.title: The Cake family.

1153322222211.content:
"Well, we'd best be going, to deliver the goods, but I can't find a babysitter." said Cup Cake. "I could babysit." said Harley. "Really, are you sure you're responsible.?" said Cup Cake. "Yes, I've babysat before." said Harley. "Okay." said Cup Cake and handed Harley a list.
1. The twins drink their formula at nine A.M., twelve P.M., three P.M., and six P.M. They need to be burped after each feeding, and Pumpkin sometimes chews things. If she chews something inappropriate, give her a chew toy.
2. If the twins are sad for no reason, they find it funny if you cover yourself in flour. Playing peekaboo is something they enjoy too but they are scared of clowns.
3. The twins take a bath after their midday feed. If they cry, bubbles and a rubber ducky will help.
4. They take naps at twelve thirty P.M. and five P.M. Each nap should be about an hour long.
5. The diapers are in the cupboard under the desk. Change them as quick as you can so they don't fuss.
She then left Harley with the babies. What does Harley do first?
1153322222211.title: Babysit Pound Cake and Pumpkin Cake.

11533222222212.content: Which other princess finds Harley?
11533222222212.title: Other.

choices: He's bit dizzy from the teleportation.
He just felt like falling over.
12.content: Why does Harley collapse after teleporting?
12.title: teleports there
